0010000111010101 1001010111001110 1 -> sum: 1011011110100100, cout: 0

0110010010011101 1011101111001010 1 -> sum: 0010000001101000, cout: 1
1010100000100101 0100000000000110 1 -> sum: 1110100000101100, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
